resources.description: Wireless technology is widely used in smart home system wireless network, which is composed of wireless network nodes. An innovative wireless network node for smart home is developed based on C8051F410 and nRF24L01. Due to the application of an appropriative message authentication technology, the security and reliability of smart home network is enhanced effectively. According to the experiments in practice, the new wireless network node, featured low cost, flexibility in design and reliability in performance, can meet the need of common household.
resources.name: Design of Wireless Network Node for Smart Home System

name: design-of-wireless-network-node-for-smart-home-system
